page.title: 10Library Service.
page.content: There is no library service building within the area but the Dorset County Council provide a fortnightly service with a mobile library van. This operates on a Tueday and stops at three places. Firstly Ryall for 15 minutes 11.oo to 11.30 am. After this it continues to Morcombelake where it stops for 20 minutes 11.35 to 11.55 am. outside Frodsham Motors garage and then proceeds to the front of The Ship Inn where it stays from 12.00 until 12.15 pm. It's last call in the area is at North Chideock where it stays for 20 minutes from 12.25 to 12.45 pm. The van includes a full range of books, and works from the West Dorset county library at Bridport.
